newsitem.title: UK: British Aerospace won't seek Airbus stake rise-FT.
newsitem.headline: British Aerospace won't seek Airbus stake rise-FT.

text.p: British Aerospace Plc will not press for an increase in its 20 percent stake in Airbus Industrie even though its assets could be worth relatively more than those of its European partners, the Financial Times said.
It said that instead the British company will press for other ways to safeguard its interests in Airbus, which announced plans to become a limited company earlier this year.
The paper, citing industry observers, said British Aerospace has accepted that any rise in its Airbus stake would be politically unacceptable in Germany -- and, in particular, France.
As an alternative, British Aerospace could receive relatively higher payments for the work it does for Airbus, the paper said.
